name: Solareum
description: Solareum bot allow smooth trading on Solana chain while also offering integrated ETH - SOL bridging in the bot. Bridge ETH to SOL and vice versa with just a few taps right in the Solareum Bot. User-Friendly UI/UX: Inspired by the simplicity of Maestro, Solareum offers a straightforward and intuitive user interface and user experience. We also have the lowest fee of 0.75% for trading fee and bridge fee.
